note:
Lapsed Radio Astronomer, coder, system analyst, perl, Linux gamer, Db2 LUW, Database Performance Analyst

Profile picture: Greyscale rendering of my face, based on a pencil source image and a side-lit photo, created using Resynthesizer in the Gnu Image Manipulation Program.

Banner image: Extreme close up of snow, processed in DarkTable with a stretched value histogram and a graded tint filter from blue to cream.
